sentences.en: Although these figures are only rough estimates, they do strikingly underline the seriousness of the problem.
sentences.cn: 虽然这些数字是比较粗糙的估计, 但在很大程度上表明了这些问题的严重性.

sentences.en: In many respects, today's macro climate is strikingly similar to that period.
sentences.cn: 今天的宏观经济状况在很多方面都与那时惊人的相似.

sentences.en: In one respect, however, the men really were strikingly similar.
sentences.cn: 然而，一方面，那些男人真的非常相似。

sentences.en: Most strikingly, the amount consumers spent in the shops grew much more quickly than anyone expected.
sentences.cn: 最惊人的是，消费者的购物支出的增长速度远远超过了任何人的预期。

sentences.en: Nuclear binding energies are strikingly high.
sentences.cn: 原子核的结合能是极大的.

sentences.en: one of the most strikingly attractive regions in Britain
sentences.cn: 英国风景异常美丽的地区之一

sentences.en: PARIS － Emmanuelle Laborit is a strikingly expressive actress.
sentences.cn: 艾曼纽?拉波希特是位表现力非常丰富的女演员.

sentences.en: The experimental conclusion is indicated rather strikingly in the Fourier plot of Fig. 223.
sentences.cn: 实验的结论非常明显地显现在图223的傅里叶曲线上.

sentences.en: The feathers of most male and female pheasants are strikingly different.
sentences.cn: 大多数雄雉和雌雉的羽毛都差异显著.

sentences.en: The limestone statue has gaunt cheeks and - most strikingly - a tipless nose.
sentences.cn: 石灰石的雕塑脸颊憔悴,鼻尖明显的翘起.

sentences.en: The quagga was a strikingly beautiful variant of the zebra.
sentences.cn: 斑驴是一种极美丽的斑马变种。

sentences.en: The race became physically and mentally gruelling, strikingly beautiful and spectacular.
sentences.cn: 赛跑身体上并且精神上变得严厉 、 惊人地美丽、惊人.

sentences.en: Their conclusions were strikingly similar to the Copenhagen Consensus.
sentences.cn: 他们的结论与哥本哈根共识几无二致.

sentences.en: They knew the mammoth because they have left us strikingly effective pictures of that creature.
sentences.cn: 他们熟悉猛犸,因为他们留下的那种动物的画像令我们印象深刻.

sentences.en: This colour contrasts strikingly with green.
sentences.cn: 这个颜色显然不同于绿色.

sentences.en: When her teeth grew in she was quite strikingly beautiful.
sentences.cn: 当她一天天长大时,她是非常美丽动人的.

words.tran_cn: 显著的，突出的，惊人的；打击的；罢工的
显著地；突出地，引人注目地

trans.tran_cn: 醒目地，引人侧目地，斐然可观
trans.tran_en: in a way that is very easy to notice
